description.value:
Your church ensures that you are cared for. You can use Religion to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Coerce], Gather Information, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Make an Impression], or make a Request as long as you are in a town or city with a church dedicated to your deity. If the target of the check is also a worshipper of your deity or is your hunted prey, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check.
